For over 53 years, George Derby Centre has supported the needs of the Federal Government, qualified veterans, and the community at large. Located in the City of Burnaby area, George Derby Centre was founded by George Derby, a returning WWI veteran. George Derby Centre has a vital place in history and continues to provide support to those in need through innovative services and programs.

A Word From Our Executive Director

What We Offer


Daily Assistance

Our trained team of caregivers aids residents with their daily activities, including walking, grooming, and assistance with meals.


Nursing Care

We want all of our residents to feel safe and cared for. That's why we provide nursing care for all of our residents.

Nutritious Meals

Everyone loves a good meal. At George Derby, we serve our residents delicious meals, snacks and drinks.

Social Engagement

We provide a supportive atmosphere, one-on one attention, and a calendar full of activities to keep our residents socially engaged

Support George Derby

George Derby Centre is a non profit organization committed to delivering the best in long term care. But we can't do it alone. We need you're help. Click the button below to find out how you can help us accomplish our vision.
